alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Inland; Clarke; Escambia; Monroe; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 1:27PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Monroe, northeastern Mobile, northern Baldwin, southeastern Washington, southeastern Clarke, western Escambia and northwestern Escambia Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 126 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of McIntosh to I65 And AL 225 to 7 miles north of Spanish Fort. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Downtown Mobile, Bay Minette, Atmore, Spanish Fort, Stockton, McCullough, Stapleton, Uriah, Calvert, Mount Vernon, Bratt, I65 And CR 1, I65 And AL 21, I65 And AL 225 and Poarch Creek Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Baldwin Inland; Clarke; Escambia; Monroe; Washington
